name: spiracle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an insect or spider, one of the small holes that allow air in and out through the surface of the body
in some fish such as sharks, a small hole behind each eye used for breathing, by allowing water through to the gills
atese/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
